name: Wigwam Aldan Medium Crew Socks - Unisex
description: Versatile and comfortable, these merino and synthetic socks have light cushion so they're great for whatever activity you choose for the day.Soft merino wool, nylon, polyester, Tencel and spandex wicks moisture and dries quickly.Cushioned sole gives a luxurious underfoot feel.Seamless toe closure contruction ensures chafe-free comfort.
